transcript:
Hello, everyone, it's Li Can here.
大家好，我是李璨 Hi, everyone, I'm Li Can's wife.
大家好，我是李璨的老婆 Today, we want to talk about
今天啊我们想聊一下 What do Chinese Think of Foreigners?
就是中国人对外国人的印象如何 The reason I invite my wife here today is
我今天为什么邀请我老婆来呢 Because of her previous job as translator,
就是因为我老婆之前因为工作的关系 she had met a lot of foreigners, right?
接触了比较多的外国人，对吧 You also had several business trips to some countries, right?
你也出差过挺多国家的，对不对 For example, Americans, what did you think of them before?
比如美国人，之前在你印象中怎么样 after you had met them in real life,
然后你在现实中接触之后 Did you feel big differences between them?
感觉有很大的差别吗 Well, there were not that big differences between them, 
对美国人的印象差别倒不太大 I used to think of them as being free and casual.
之前会觉得他们比较自由，然后随性 But talk of being free and casual,
但其实说自由随性 I think Europeans are more free and casual than them.
我感觉欧洲人好像更加的自由随性 Are Europeans really that free and casual?
欧洲人很自由随性吗 I thought the Europeans were traditional.
我印象中以为欧洲人比较传统一些 Because people said that the Europe was the Old World,
因为以前都说欧洲是旧世界 While the USA was the New World.
美国是新世界嘛 So I always think that the Americans
所以感觉好像我一直以为就是美国人 are very free and casual.
很自由很随性 The idea of Europeans being free and casual
欧洲人很自由很随性 is actually beyond my understanding.
这倒突破我的认知啊 Can you give us an example?
你举个例子可以吗 Example, well,
举例子呀 When we went to Italy that time,
比如说我们去的意大利 in my opinion, all the Italians we met
然后见到的意大利人 quite knew well how to enjoy their lives,
然后我觉得他们很会享受生活 and the life there was not that fast-paced.
然后节奏不是那么的快 Right...and you could also see
对对对……然后能看到有 someone just taking sunbath in their own courtyards,
有些人就在自家的那个小院里子里晒太阳 seemed they could stay there all day.
可以待一天 We also went to a German company,
然后我们去过一个德国公司 people there appeared to be very rigorous,
然后那里的人给我感觉就很严谨 Right, the Germans have always been
对，德国人好像一直比较被 have always been considered quite rigorous by the whole world,
世界，全世界人民认为都是比较严谨 and rather inflexible, as compared with others.
刻板一些，相对而言 They also tend to abide by the regulations, right?
比较遵守条条规规啥的，对吧 What do you think of British, how about their characteristics?
你觉得英国人特点，有什么特点不 In your opinion.
在你感受来 Talk about British,
英国人啊 When I was in school, I learned from the books
英国人我之前上学的时候 that they were quite gentlemanly.
学习到反正就感觉英国他们比较绅士 Right...and they do things unhurriedly.
对对……然后呢慢条斯理 After meeting some,
接触之后呢 I found out that the impressions were true,
也确实是这样 they were truly very gentlemanly,
然后真的特别的绅士 very gentlemanly...very gentlemanly,
特别绅士……特别绅士 the way they treat the ladies,
对待女士啊 and they were also very considerate in almost every aspect.
各方面都真的考虑都很周到 But, there exists something
但同时也会有一些就是 very inflexible in their characters.
比较刻板的东西在里面 Just like in our meeting then,
就是我们在工作中 we were stuck in just one thing
然后呢会因为一件事情 because of their low flexibility.
他们的灵活度 I didn't mean all the British,
当然不是泛指所有的英国人 just those we encountered in our meeting then,
就是我们当时接触当时工作的时候 they were really lack of some flexibility.
他们的灵活度有一些欠缺 As compared with us Chinese,
那你是相对于中国人而言 Right, as compared with Chinese...compared with Chinese.
对，相对于中国人……相对于中国人而言 For example, for just one thing,
就是在这个事情上 How can we make some flexible changes,
我们怎么灵活变通一下 so as to make things go on smoothly?
然后让这个事情顺利的进行下去 But, back then, we were stuck there almost all day
但是当时我们因为一件还 because of one thing that was not that important.
不是特别重要的事情卡在那里卡了一天 Oh, whether it was that time when they invited you for a dinner,
哦，是不是是不是本来说邀请你们吃饭 then they canceled it because of that?
然后就因为这个取消了 Yeah...we were just stuck there...everything was canceled,
对……一直卡那块……所有都取消了然后 then all our meetings behind that 
就是我们后面的所有的 had been delayed that as well.
会议然后呢全部都因此被耽搁了 I see...and the meeting wasn't finished until very late.
对对对……然后一直到了晚上，很晚很晚 But, when I think of it now, I can see that as for the standards
但是我现在来想就是大家对于标准 well... and regulations,
对……和对于规则 we had different perception and understanding.
它的认知和理解是不同的 Were Americans like this too?
那美国人是不是也这样 I think the Americans are more flexible,
美国人灵活度我觉得要高一点 More flexible...yeah, more flexible.
高，还高一些啊……要高一些 You've been to France before,
你们之前还去过法国 How do you feel about the French?
法国的工，法国人给你们感觉怎么样 You don't have a strong impression?
印象特不是特别深刻 Yes, I can not remember.
不是特别深刻 People seem to say the French
法国人好像就是说 are quite romantic as I can recall it,
之前印象说是比较浪漫啊啥的嘛 Rumor goes like that.
有这种说法 But there're also others say that
但是我感觉好像之前又有人说 French in the whole are quite lazy,
法国这个人他们整体比较懒散 They just...as I heard,
成天就……我就听说哈 or through News...they protested a lot
看新闻啥……成天要求罢工啊 to demand more time for holiday or something like that,
就是要给自己更多的休假时间啥的 It feels like they are more...well, quite like the Italians as you said.
就感觉更……也是像你说的意大利一样 People in France are quite the same,
法国可能都一样 they care more about the enjoyment of life, right,
更追求生活的享受一些，对 compared to them, Eastern Asians or Asians in the whole
相对而言就是东亚或者亚洲人 are more diligent in general.
整体会更勤劳一些 Then, there's also the treatment of others, such as,
然后还有待人方面可能比如说咱们 South Korea...Yeah...they are very similar to us Chinese,
韩国……嗯……和咱们，和我们中国比较接近哈 very similar.
非常相似 The time you went to South Korea, you must've felt
你当时好像去韩国感受感觉是应该 the warmest welcome as guests, 
待你们，待客之道最热情的吧 most considerate, right?
最周到的。对吧？ This kind of etiquette unique to Oriental Culture 
就是东方文化的这种礼仪 were valued quite highly by them in my opinion,
然后我觉得还是蛮看重的 No matter South Korea or Japan...right.
韩国，日本……对 After we went there,
然后就是我们去了之后 The food and accommodation provided by them...right
对于大家的这个衣食住行各方面……对 were the most considerate...most considerate.
然后安排的算是最体贴的……最体贴的 and most thoughtful, and we felt very comfortable.
最周到的，会让大家的舒适度都很高 As to the cooperation aspect,
然后对于这个合作方面也是 They were quite flexible,
就是相对蛮灵活的 so they were more flexible.
他们灵活一些啊 Yeah, maybe we're more like goal-directed,
嗯，我们可能更多的是以目标为导向 Then, for the rules, for the people who values more rules
然后的，但是对于规则，比较看重规则 and standards, they maybe are more process-directed.
和标准的人来说可能是以过程为导向 So our...ideas...yeah,
所以大家的这个……理念……是，对 I mean, our logic approaches were rather different.
是是，这个逻辑方式是有一些差异的 That's right...I couldn't understand before,
对对对……以前是不太能理解 But now I think...you can understand...that's quite normal.
现在觉得……能理解……很正常很正常 So the people of every country, even every individuals
就每个国家的人，甚至单独的个体 have very different mindsets, right?
思维都差异很大了，是吧 That's right.
是的是的 But, maybe,
但可能就 The whole atmosphere of the entire country will influence
整个国家这个整体的这种氛围啊啥会影响 people in the general direction.
会有大概的这种方向的影响 Yeah...Right.
是的……是吧 Then, regions also have differences as well.
然后其实像区域也有差异 As for the foreigners I've encountered,
就是我接触到的这个外国人 Maybe, for example some Italians I encountered
可能在其他区域的同样国家的 in certain regions of the same country
比如说我接触到的一部分意大利人 are like that.
是这个样子 Right...but the Italians in other regions
对……可能其他区域的意大利人 are not necessarily like that.
未必又是这个样子 Right...Just like in China...Right...Chengdu is
对对……就像我们中国……对……成都是一个 a very small-paced...right...they enjoy life
很慢节奏……对……还比较享受 People in Yunnan are also like that.
